Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I just bought a copy of KSP and when I login the site it shows me the game I bought and gives me download options. Until here everything is fine. Problem is that I have a very unstable connection and it is doing the download to crash. There is any other way to download, using torrent maybe or something else?

Thanks in advance.

This can sometimes be exacerbated by certain browsers... if you have Firefox, you can get an extension called DownThemAll! -- it's basically a download manager, and tends to be quite good at making sure connections don't fail at the drop of a hat.

Otherwise... well, it's often helpful to simply try a browser other than the one you happen to be using -- Chrome, Firefox, Opera... all should have a fair chance of getting the download completed properly.
